RedrawInstruction

public RedrawInstruction(boolean draw_,
                         boolean add_,
                         DataSetTools.util.floatPoint2D xrange_,
                         DataSetTools.util.floatPoint2D yrange_,
                         GraphableData data_)
MAIN CONSTRUCTOR. other constructors call this constructor, supplying default data if necessary.
Parameters:
draw_ - used by recipiant to decide whether or not to redraw
add_ - used by recipiant to decide whether or not to add data
offset_ - percent offset (0,infinity)
xrange_ - range of data in horizontal direction
yrange_ - range of data in vertical direction
data_ - GraphableData if add_ is set, otherwise null
